评论详情: I almost love this hoodie… except the zipper catches and is difficult to zip up every time and there is a flap of unnecessary fabric on the inside with a surged edge that constantly flips outwards instead of staying in like it should.

It's super warm and comfy, but for a sweatshirt that claims to be "oversized", the sleeves are short and the overall length is short. Width qualifies as oversized, so the overall shape/fit is a bit odd. Also, if you don't have it zipped up, the odd bit of extra fabric on the inside (on both sides of the zipper) constantly gets in the way and/or turned inside out. I'm definitely glad I didn't pay full price, but I'll use it at my office when it gets chilly.
The material has a nice thickness about it. However, the Zipper gets stuck most times and you have to keep playing with it to get it zipped up.

评论概述: Very Thick - Think Coat, Not Hoodie
评论详情: Very thick, very warm but feels like I'm wearing a coat, if I'm honest. Also, the sizing is a bit large. I normally wear an XL (to be comfy and not snug), but I could have gotten an L instead. If you need something to wear on cold days, this will do the job. You can layer it under a larger coat on really cold days, but if the temperature hovers around 50 or 60 degrees then THIS is your coat. Full stop. Also, I hear people comment on the zipper and they're not wrong, the zipper is a little difficult but after wearing it for awhile it seems to have become easier. I also hang it in the closet with the zipper all the way up, which helps.
The zipper stopped working after a month.  Don't wear it anymore.
The zipper on this is very cheap and does not work.
I have been searching for a zip up that is both really warm and comfortable. This sweat shirt is definitely it. I like the over sized fit of it and the color is so pretty.

It’s super cute and surprisingly warm! It was 20 degrees Fahrenheit and snowing the other day and I was still cozy in my jacket! I didn’t expect it to keep me this warm, especially against the high OK winds.

I got the XL for a semi oversized fit and it’s exactly what I wanted. I’m usually a large and about 185 lbs. it’s pretty thick and good quality. I got the light grey, but I will be getting the black next time! Also love that it zips up
Super thick, comfortable. Make sure to wash it x2, if will have fuzzies inside during the first wash.

The jacket is very warm . Color is just as advertised. I feel it’s worth the purchase. I liked the way the small fit verses the medium.

Love this hoodie so much, went and got another color (ordered red and then went back for the tan/beige color).  Has a nice loose fit yet still heavier where it can hold its shape. I am in my 3rd trimester and usually wear a small. I ordered a medium for extra room and have NO regrets. Love the looseness and appreciate the giant hood. Good price too.

I don't often write reviews but felt I had to for these sweatshirts!! I wish I could give it more stars. I'm ALWAYS cold and wear a lot of sweaters and sweatshirts. There's nothing worse than ordering a sweatshirt only to receive it and find out it's barely more than a long sleeved t-shirt. These sweatshirts did not disappoint!! Not only are they THICK, HEAVY, and WARM, they are built to last!! The stitching is reinforced and the zipper is solid. There's nothing on this that will easily rip, fray, or fall apart. I originally ordered these for my tween daughters but I'll be ordering more for myself!!!

I have bought this jacket in multiple colors. I had recently ordered a blue one thinking that I was getting this one, but then I realized I ordered from a different company. I purchased this hoodie in September, thinking I will be ahead of the cold weather. I actually started wearing the jacket towards the end of October, it is a very thick material for a hoodie , beautiful color, I loved it! However, a few months in and the metal zipper broke, and I haven’t worn it religiously, maybe a couple of times a week over about a month and a halfs time. I’m past the return window according to what I read. So buyer beware, you may purchase a jacket that will fail a few months into its use and be stuck with something unwearable.

Is it a color problem? I have had no trouble with the zipper on this purchase.  It is Metal, and it has been washed.  Beside some average black fading , it is Perfect.
